translation:
Most Illustrious Sir,

In response to the official letter of Your Excellency Abreu, I hereby send the contestation with which I believe you will be satisfied. I return the letter of the same Abreu.

God keep Your Excellency

To Citizen Domingos José de Almeida  
Secretary of the Treasury  
Antônio Vicente da Fontoura  
Bagé, February 21, 1842.

Secretariat of the Presidency of the Republic  
To Citizen Domingos José de Almeida  
At his Residence.  
From the Minister of the Treasury.
